summary: Adds a couple redguard followers throughout the world.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][u][size=3].$$$.  This shit adds a couple Hammerfell Redguards throughout the world  .$$$[/size][size=3].[/size][/u]


[u]CONTENT[/u]
[/size]
[size=3]Contains 6 separate Redguard NPCs
All are possible followers
Only Tiki is marrigeable
Lore Friendly

[size=5]Tiki:[/size]
Essential Character
Location: Dragonsreach, Whiterun
Class: One - Handed
Class: Archery

[size=5]Arumba:[/size]
Essential Character
Location: Candlehearth Hall, Windhelm
Class: Two - Handed

[size=5]Hoth:[/size]
Essential Character
Location: The Frozen Hearth, Winterhold
Class: Heavy Armor
Class: Magic

[size=5]Tropica Warrior(s) [x3]:[/size]
Non - Essential Character(s)
Location: Jarl's Longhouse, Falkreath
Class: Sucks at Everything[/size]
[size=6]


[u]COMPATIBILITY[/u]
[/size]
[size=3]Will work best with Skyrim to its most recent update and Apachii hair mod.[/size]
[size=6]


[u]INSTALL[/u]
[/size]
[size=3]DL with NMM
OR
DL manually


[size=4]THEN[/size]


INSTALL with NMM
OR
INSTALL with Wrye Bash (BAIN)
OR
Merge data folder with Skyrim data folder[/size]
[size=6]


[u]UNINSTALL[/u]
[/size]
[size=3]UNCHECK in NMM
OR
UNCHECK in Wrye Bash (BAIN)
OR
REMOVE all downloaded files manually[/size]



[/center]
author: Detroit313
